subject: Sq pro shifter
description_text:
Hi when will the

conversations.body_text: Hi Paul Cundell,   Progress is moving quickly. Our new design has completed testing and is ready for production.

Great let me know when it’s ready I’ll take one 


Sent from my iPhone
